DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effects of chronic leucine supplemetion on glucose homeostasis, body compositin, muscle mass and strength of healthy and young subjects
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Chronic Leucine Supplemetion on Glucose Homeostasis, Body Compositin, Muscle Mass and Strength of Healthy and Young Subjects
DOC.criteria: Nonsmokers; Healthy; Nonusers of dietary supplements and drugs Not engaged in any regular physical activity program Vegetarians
